p: Importantly, the dataset is nationally representative both demographically and spatially; the demographics of the sample population closely resembling the country as a whole, with the RCGP RSC network of practices spread across England in order to reflect the distribution of the population. In May 2017, the RCGP RSC network included 1,835,211 patients (approximately 3.3% of the total population in England) from 174 practices [ 22].
